thread.title: Can you recognise Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Alia Bhatt’s recent movies from these minimalist posters?
thread.title_full: Can you recognise Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Alia Bhatt’s recent movies from these minimalist posters?

author: Sreeju Sudhakaran
title: Can you recognise Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Alia Bhatt’s recent movies from these minimalist posters?
text:
Alia Bhatt, Priyanka Chopra, Deepika Padukone, Shilpa Shetty, Disha Patani: Who wore the metallic skirt the best? 
Read our stories? Loved our gossips? Now it’s time to have some fun! 
Are you a really smart movie buff with a penchant of being a Sherlock ? Then this page might appease you. You have to recognise certain recent movies through the below minimalist posters. If you have no clue what minimalist poster is, here’s the definition that I found in Yahoo answers –“Minimalism is a style that, in graphics, presents the object in question (a shoe, a dove, a dog a building, for example) plainly, starkly and with a high degree of realism without extra decoration. It may also repeat the image a number of times. Think of it as a representation of the thing itself without added artistic devices.” 
In short, you have to recognise a few movies starring Shah Rukh Khan , Salman Khan , Alia Bhatt through the below posters which have little clues about the movie. Don’t worry, there are all recent movies that have released in 2016. The answers are given below each poster, which you have to point and drag your mouse to find out. 
Well, put your thinking hats one, and challenge the Bollywood geek in you… 
Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Baar Baar Dekho 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Befikre 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): FAN 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Ki & Ka 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Neerja 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Udta Punjab 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Sultan 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): PINK 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Dear Zindagi 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Dangal 

Answer (drag your mouse ahead): Shivaay 
Photo keeda-man: Neeraj Kathale
